name: HyperFUN
description: HyperFUN is the first all-in-one GambleFi deflationary token on HyperLiquid. It provides a range of Telegram games such as blackjack, coin flip, and slots, all of which are provably fair. The project features a dashboard for tracking perpetual markets data, spot data, genesis Hyperliquid token data, upcoming tokens, and auction information. Additionally, it includes a configurable buy tracker for Hyperliquid chat groups, enhancing community support across other projects and user engagement.
